{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3025415,"name":"Evan Waldo","username":"6453_bog_bots","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/6/8e7dd6/{size}.png","created_at":"2022-03-18T18:50:41.258Z","cooked":"

Hi. I’m with team 6453 and we need help with coding the triggers in Labview. We use thrust master controllers and we need to hit one to spin a motor clockwise and hit the other trigger to spin the same motor counterclockwise. we are using tank drive. A picture or screenshot would be awesome.

Triggers, as in the Left and Right Bottom Pulls used by index/Middle Fingers?

Like the two on the pic here?

thrust720×405 54 KB

Both triggers return values of 0.0 to 1.0
So invert one of the triggers to get 0.0 to -1.0 values
